function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Concordance between self-report and objective compliance measures differs based on the method of assessment","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of compliance levels may lead to misinformed mitigation strategies and interventions","Mitigation":"Validate self-report measures with objective methods to ensure accuracy of compliance assessment","Technologies":"Data tracking and monitoring technologies, wearable devices for tracking movement and compliance","People":"Researchers, health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Variation in compliance may be influenced by substantive moral support for measures and perception of costs and strain","Impact":"Low moral support and high perceived costs or strain may lead to lower compliance levels and increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Develop targeted interventions to address moral support, reduce perceived costs, and alleviate strain","Technologies":"Behavioral psychology interventions, public health communication strategies","People":"Community members, individuals subject to mitigation measures","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders"}]}
